newsitem.title: UK: Tempest survey rankings for Europe, M.East, Africa.
newsitem.headline: Tempest survey rankings for Europe, M.East, Africa.

text.p: The following are the key rankings for the Europe, Middle East and Africa region from a global emerging markets survey sponsored by Reuters and conducted by Tempest Consultants over the past three months.
The report collated the views of over 840 fund managers and buy-side analysts, over 230 national and international brokers and some 1,100 companies in emerging markets.
The fund manager ranking of best brokers' research product and service for Europe, Middle East and Africa:
Funds' ratings of the best broker execution ability :
Funds managers' perceptions of broker skills :
Best written research: 1.ING Barings 2.CS First Boston 3.Nomura International
Best analyst telephone calls: 1.ING Barings 2.Creditanstalt 3.Nomura International
Best analyst visits: 1.ING Barings 2.CS First Boston 3.Nomura International
Best sales skills: 1.ING Barings 2.CS First Boston 3.Schroders
Fund managers' perceptions of broker research priorities :
Joint first four : SBC Waburg Securities, Fleming Martin, Nomura International and NatWest Market Securities

Fund managers polled said they met an average 143 companies in this region last year. They prefered to meet chief executive officers and finance directors rather than investor relations or public relations officials.
Some 56.44 percent of the funds intended to increase the number of visits next year, 43.56 percent said the number would stay the same and none intended to decrease visits.
